function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Policy variables not fully enacted","Impact":"Ineffective containment of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Ensure that policy variables are fully enacted and not left partially implemented","Technologies":"Policy monitoring and enforcement tools","People":"General population","Owner":"Government and policy-making bodies"},{"Description":"Grouping of policies may obscure specific effects","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying the impact of individual policies on disease propagation","Mitigation":"Conduct separate analyses for individual policies to understand their specific impact","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, data visualization tools","People":"Data analysts, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Limited sample of data for estimating policy impact","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of policy effects on disease propagation","Mitigation":"Increase the sample size of data or use statistical techniques to account for data limitations","Technologies":"Statistical modeling, data augmentation techniques","People":"Data analysts, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
